vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Num.3.35;
father of: Zuriel (H6700)
§ Abihail = "my father is might"
1) a Levite in Moses's time
2) a Gadite
3) father of Esther
4) wife of Abishur
5) wife of Rehoboam
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   padre de Suriel; tribu de Leví; (b)   hijo de Hurí; tribu de Gad; (c)   padre de Ester; tribu de Benjamín \ (c)   esposa de Abisur, descendiente de Jerahmeel, tribu de Judá; (d)   hija de Eliab, hijo de Jesé
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞比孩 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "我的父親是有權力的"
1) 一位在摩西時代的利未人 (民 3:35)
2) 迦得的後裔 (代上 5:14)
3) 以斯帖的父親 (斯 2:15; 9:29)
4) 亞比述的妻子 (代上 2:29)
5) 羅波安的妻子 (代下 11:18)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚比孩 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "我的父亲是有权力的"
1) 一位在摩西时代的利未人 (民 3:35)
2) 迦得的后裔 (代上 5:14)
3) 以斯帖的父亲 (斯 2:15; 9:29)
4) 亚比述的妻子 (代上 2:29)
5) 罗波安的妻子 (代下 11:18)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A womanof the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.29; married to Abishur (H0051);
mother of: Ahban (H0257), Molid (H4140)
§ Abihail = "my father is might"
1) a Levite in Moses's time
2) a Gadite
3) father of Esther
4) wife of Abishur
5) wife of Rehoboam

A man of the tribe of Gad living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.5.14;
son of: Huri (H2359);
father of: Michael (H4317H), Meshullam (H4918I), Sheba (H7652), Jorai (H3140), Jacan (H3275), Zia (H2127), Eber (H5677H)
§ Abihail = "my father is might"
1) a Levite in Moses's time
2) a Gadite
3) father of Esther
4) wife of Abishur
5) wife of Rehoboam

A woman of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.11.18;
daughter of: Eliab (H0446I); married to Jerimoth (H3406N);
mother of: Mahalath (H4258H)
§ Abihail = "my father is might"
1) a Levite in Moses's time
2) a Gadite
3) father of Esther
4) wife of Abishur
5) wife of Rehoboam

A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Est.2.15;
father of: Esther (H0635)
§ Abihail = "my father is might"
1) a Levite in Moses's time
2) a Gadite
3) father of Esther
4) wife of Abishur
5) wife of Rehoboam
